targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") as "usage" FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_bytes"),1s)/8 as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_packets"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_packets"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_dropped"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_dropped"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_errors"),1s) as "rx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_errors"),1s) as "tx" FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE  host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("message_count") as "messages" FROM "nsq_channel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("client_count") as client FROM "nsq_channel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("requeue_count") FROM "nsq_channel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("inflight_count") FROM "nsq_channel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("deferred_count") as "deferred" FROM "nsq_channel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("timeout_count") FROM "nsq_channel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("message_count") as "message" FROM "nsq_client" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),* fill(null)
SELECT mean("requeue_count") FROM "nsq_client" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("inflight_count") FROM "nsq_client" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("ready_count") FROM "nsq_client" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("finish_count") FROM "nsq_client" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("topic_count") FROM "nsq_server" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("channel_count") FROM "nsq_topic" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean("message_count") FROM "nsq_topic" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(null)
